# Invoice.wiki

> Free online invoice generator. Create professional PDF invoices with tax support, 40+ currencies, and 6 languages. No registration, 100% private.

Invoice.wiki is a browser-based invoice tool for freelancers, small businesses, and entrepreneurs. All processing happens locally in your browser â€” your data never leaves your device.

Key features:
- Instant PDF download
- 40+ currencies (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)
- 6 languages (EN, DE, CS, PL, SK, UK)
- 10 brand colors
- Flexible tax support (VAT, sales tax, GST, custom rates)
- Auto calculations (totals, discounts, taxes)
- Works on any device
- No signup, no fees

## Core Pages

- [Homepage](https://invoice.wiki/): Main landing page with features overview and invoice examples
- [Create Invoice](https://invoice.wiki/create-invoice): Interactive invoice creation form with real-time preview
- [About](https://invoice.wiki/about): Detailed information about Invoice.wiki, invoice components, and legal significance
- [FAQ](https://invoice.wiki/faq): Frequently asked questions about invoicing, privacy, features, and business usage
- [Privacy Policy](https://invoice.wiki/privacy-policy): Complete privacy protection details and data handling practices

## Technical Documentation

- [Invoice Components Guide](https://invoice.wiki/about#key-components-of-an-invoice): Detailed breakdown of seller information, buyer information, invoice details, payment information, and items/totals
- [Supported Currencies](https://invoice.wiki/about): List of 40+ supported international currencies with proper formatting
- [Legal Information](https://invoice.wiki/about#legal-relevance-of-invoices): Invoice legal significance, tax reporting, and compliance requirements

## Optional

- [Security Features](https://invoice.wiki/privacy-policy): Browser-based processing, local data handling, and encryption details
